needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Prosciutto is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: The secret ingredient needed to build the perfect pizza is cheese, but in this case, it is not just any cheese, but rather a 50-50 combination of mozzarella and Parmesan, and a topping of truffles that gives it a rich, earthy flavor, as well as the right amount of salt.
